languages.text: Тошнотворные кровавые мазки на стене складываются в зловещий символ. Кровь словно впиталась в толщу металла.

traits.locale_text: Тошнотворные кровавые мазки на стене складываются в зловещий символ. Вам кажется, что кровь не столько размазана, сколько впиталась в толщу металла.

languages.text: The stomach-turning bloody smears on the wall form a malevolent symbol. The blood seems to have penetrated deep into the metal.
languages.original_text: Тошнотворные кровавые мазки на стене складываются в зловещий символ. Кровь словно впиталась в толщу металла.

traits.locale_text: The stomach-turning bloody smears on the wall form a malevolent symbol. The blood seems to have penetrated deep into the metal.
The stomach-turning bloody smears on the wall form a malevolent symbol. The blood seems to have penetrated deep into the metal.
The stomach-turning bloody smears on the wall form a malevolent symbol. The blood seems to have penetrated deep into the metal.
The stomach-turning bloody smears on the wall form a malevolent symbol. The blood seems to have penetrated deep into the metal.

languages.text: Las repugnantes manchas carmesíes de la pared forman un símbolo maligno. La sangre parece haber penetrado en lo más profundo del metal.
languages.original_text: The stomach-turning bloody smears on the wall form a malevolent symbol. The blood seems to have penetrated deep into the metal.

languages.text: 墙上令人作呕的血迹绘成了邪恶的符号，鲜血似乎已经渗入金属深处。
languages.original_text: The stomach-turning bloody smears on the wall form a malevolent symbol. The blood seems to have penetrated deep into the metal.

traits.locale_text: 一个用鲜血绘成的符号。

languages.text: 胸が苦しくなるほど血に塗れた壁の汚れは、形を変えて邪悪なシンボルになった。血は金属の奥まで浸透しているように見える。
languages.original_text: The stomach-turning bloody smears on the wall form a malevolent symbol. The blood seems to have penetrated deep into the metal.

traits.locale_text: 胸が苦しくなるほど血に塗れた壁の汚れは、形を変えて邪悪なシンボルになった。血は金属の奥まで浸透しているように見える。

languages.text: Die Übelkeit erregenden Blutspuren an der Wand bilden ein grausames Symbol. Das Blut scheint tief in das Metall eingedrungen zu sein.
languages.original_text: The stomach-turning bloody smears on the wall form a malevolent symbol. The blood seems to have penetrated deep into the metal.

languages.text: Les affreuses traînées rougeâtres qui maculent le mur forment un symbole maléfique. Le sang semble avoir pénétré profondément dans le métal.
languages.original_text: The stomach-turning bloody smears on the wall form a malevolent symbol. The blood seems to have penetrated deep into the metal.

traits.locale_text: Un symbole inscrit avec du sang.

languages.text: Duvarlardaki mide bulandıran kan izleri, fena bir sembolü meydana getiriyor. Kan, metalin derinlerine işlemiş gibi görünüyor.
languages.original_text: The stomach-turning bloody smears on the wall form a malevolent symbol. The blood seems to have penetrated deep into the metal.

traits.locale_text: Duvarlardaki mide bulandıran kan izleri, fena bir sembolü meydana getiriyor. Kan, metalin derinlerine işlemiş gibi görünüyor.
